mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questionboard ( articleNo, title, contents, uid, problemNo, point, regiTime, isGroup ) VALUES ( #{articleNo}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{uid}, #{problemNo}, #{point}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT articleNo, title, problemNo, regiTime, nickname FROM questionboard q JOIN userinfo u USING (uid)
SELECT articleNo, title, contents, point, regiTime, problemNo, nickname FROM questionboard q JOIN userinfo u USING (uid) WHERE articleNo = #{articleNo}
SELECT articleNo, title, regiTime, problemNo, nickname FROM questionboard q JOIN userinfo u USING (uid) WHERE UPPER(title) LIKE UPPER(#{title})
SELECT articleNo, title, regiTime, problemNo, nickname FROM questionboard q JOIN userinfo u USING (uid) WHERE UPPER(nickname) LIKE UPPER(#{nickname})
SELECT articleNo, title, regiTime, problemNo, nickname FROM questionboard q JOIN userinfo u USING (uid) WHERE problemNo = #{problemNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE questionboard SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, regiTime = now() WHERE articleNo = #{articleNo}
